symbolDetail.errorMessage: We couldn't find the symbol you're looking for.

hero.heading: Discover the World's Cultural Symbols
hero.subheading: Explore, learn and contribute to our growing collection of symbolic heritage

footer.tagline: Preserving and celebrating the world's symbolic heritage

whatIs.question: What is Symbolica?
whatIs.answer: Symbolica is a digital platform dedicated to cataloging, preserving, and sharing cultural symbols from around the world.

howContribute.question: How can I contribute?
howContribute.answer: You can contribute by submitting symbols, improving descriptions, or helping with translations.

rights.question: What about rights to symbols?
rights.answer: Symbolica respects traditional ownership and rights to cultural symbols. We provide attribution and context for all symbols.

mapExplorer.title: Symbol Map Explorer
mapExplorer.description: Discover symbols and patterns across the world's cultures through our interactive map
mapExplorer.betaNotice: The map feature is currently in beta. Some locations may not be accurately represented.
mapExplorer.listViewComingSoon: The list view is coming soon. Stay tuned!

symbolExplorer.title: Symbol Explorer
symbolExplorer.description: Explore our collection of cultural symbols, patterns and motifs
symbolExplorer.noResults: No symbols match your filter criteria
symbolExplorer.mapViewDescription: Explore symbols based on their geographical origin and distribution
